name: Alacrity
description:
Requires 4 Xbox controllers to play.

  • Left Thumbstick - Dash up and down within your lane
  • Right Thumbstick - Aim your vehicle
  • Right Trigger - Fire a projectile the direction your vehicle is aiming

The objective of the game is to be the player in front at the end of the time limit, if a player is hit by a projectile they are slowed, but will eventually gain they're speed back.

Beware of sudden track changes that make aiming difficult!
